tokens.text: checks if all animations have played through at least once

description: Returns 1.0 if all animations in the current animation controller state have played through at least once, else it returns 0.0. Only valid in an animation controller.

generated_doNotEdit.title: All Animations Finished
generated_doNotEdit.description: Only valid in an animation controller.  Returns 1.0 if all animations in the current animation controller state have played through at least once, else it returns 0.0.
